DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study define th Maximum Tolerated Dose ( MTD ) recommend dose ( RD ) ZD6474 combination fix standard dose gemcitabine capecitabine
DOC.brief_title: Dose Escalation Study With Zactima Chemotherapy Metastatic Pancreas Carcinoma
DOC.criteria: Confirmed diagnosis locally advance unresectable metastatic pancreatic adenocarcinoma ECOG performance status < 1 Measurable disease Severe uncontrolled systemic disease Clinically significant cardiac event myocardial infarction Any concomitant medication may cause OTc prolongation , include Torsades de Pointes
